mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment (cno, bno, gno, commenter, comments) values (seq_comment.nextval, #{bno}, seq_comment.currval, #{commenter}, #{comments})
insert into tbl_comment(cno, bno, gno, commenter, comments, depth) values(seq_comment.nextval, #{bno}, #{gno}, #{commenter}, #{comments}, 1)
mapper.update: update tbl_comment set comments = #{comments}, updatedate = sysdate where cno = #{cno}
update tbl_comment set deleteyn = 'y' where cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from ( select rownum rn, rank() over(partition by gno order by depth asc, cno asc)rank, gno, cno, bno, COMMENTER, COMMENTS, regdate, updatedate from tbl_comment where bno = #{bno} and deleteyn = 'n' order by gno desc ) where rn <= #{cri.page} * 10 ) where rn > (#{cri.page} - 1) * 10
select count(cno) from tbl_comment where deleteyn = 'n' and bno = #{bno}
